**Basic info**
name: Name [written in the language followed by country id; e.g. Español (MX), Français (FR)]
id: xx-xx [uses ISO identifiers, ascii letters; e.g. es-mx, fr-fr]

**Data**
drag the `.json` file here. Do not insert it as raw text.
